text: The inhibitory effects of Abies koreana Horstmann ' s Silberlocke essential oil , mainly constituted by bornyl acetate , limonene and α - pinene , on pro - inflammatory mediators ( NO and PGE 2 ) were related to the modulation of iNOS and COX - 2 expression , since the expression of iNOS and COX - 2 mRNA and iNOS and COX - 2 protein was reduced [ 143 ] .
